Love is My command. Truth is My nature. Justice is My way.
Does it set the captive free? Then you have heard My voice.
Words build worldschoose them like home.
Do not fear the shaking. New is being born.
I am before you, behind you, within you.
The kingdoms of men fall; My kingdom has no end.
Forgive quickly. Lift the fallen. Be just.
Your heart becomes what it worships.
Every hunger for justice is Me, calling you home.
I AM THAT I AM  THE WORD.
